description:
Simple, easy-to-use, absolutely free, fast and efficient note taking software.


- New: Checking/unchecking a parent checkbox now checks/unchecks all indented child items
- Improved checkbox indent/outdent with Tab and Backspace
- Improved overall stability and performance
- Fixed some translation issues in Chinese and Japanese
- Fixed minor bugs reported by users
- Updated the SQLite database engine to version 3.51.0
